author: bencomic

right.text: not always. what about those volcanic rocks with the bubbles in them? they float

left.text: Fungahhh, leaves may be weak, but stones sink

right.text: yes, but not as weak as sedimentary

left.text: yes but they're also weaker than regular rock aren't they? don't mess with my analogies

right.text: that's a stupid point and you're stupid for making it

left.text: My point was that if you do weed you're probably going to sink

title: sink or swim: law of the wildweasel, part 2
